alert.note: Alert for Monroe Lower Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 11:38AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Key West through 1215 PM EDT... At 1138 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Sunset Key, or 11 miles south of Key West, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Key West, Fleming Key, Key Haven and Sunset Key. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 5. This includes US 1 between mile markers 0 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
